@tedxia  Sorry for late reviews. I think this behavior is by-design that if there is no live brokers in the assigned replicas, we will return null leader indicating that this partition is offline.

@saahn I am wondering if this can be done by having a custom message handler? It seems a not ideal to introduce a configuration that can be achieved by another designed feature. The prefix sounds like a pretty specific configuration for mirroring. It is essentially sending messages to another topic, which is one of the use case that message handler is designed for. So it might be better if we can leverage the current design without introducing an additional configuration which is to address a specific need.
It is a use full patch for kafka 0.10.x.  I can't use --num-threqads or --batch-size now for kafka 0.10.x
